Food was hot and ready soo many choices and meat is soft enough for the baby to eat
Good services, My sister likes that food

I had such a wonderful meal!! The lunch special with stew chicken and rice and peas was incredibly seasoned and the meat was so juicy. Leona was very kind and her service was excellent!! this will be a regular spot
I had a delicious gluten-free, dairy-free meal. They were very helpful with my allergies. Fantastic food, unlike anything I've tasted. What a highlight of a trip!

Food was a mess taste very bad (I won‚Äôt feed a dog the food) and when I reach out to them they never respond I had a few time food or snacks was not fresh but I say nothing‚Ä¶  but eating here for over 3years  I am so disappointed cause up to this date no one respond to me.
NEVER EATING HERE AGAIN

I didn't like when she slammed the change. Y'all a tip jar down whether you needed us to tip her or she thought somebody was taking something from her jar. I didn't appreciate that. Other than that, the food was great and prices were okay too
Preeya is amazing!!!
preeya was incredible and this place is my daily!!!
BEAUTIFUL Staff and amazing food and service! ILL BE BACK MI AMOR

Best doubles I've ever had, might even be best meal I've had in New York. I had the doubles & aloo pie - both vegan, both so delicious. The staff gave great honest service and felt like being in my auntie's kitchen. My meal plus my cousin's meal of two doubles cost us around $9 altogether. Plenty of seating inside & outside. Loved it here. Will be coming back!
Food and service is great! The baked goods are so nice and fresh! The homemade house juice chefs kiss!! When I am in the area I have to stop by and grab something!
The food was awesome and delicious, the baked chicken was delicious oh my ü§§ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞
I wish I lived closer, this is the greatest doubles and roti shop food I‚Äôve had in NYC. And the servers are the sweetest. They deserve all your roti shop business. 20/10.

Go see for yourself
Food doesn‚Äôt miss and service is on point,  this restaurant is definitely in the rotation!
Amazing food and customer service
Yum! We stopped by on a whim when we were walking by, so glad we did. Food was delicious! We got doubles and jerk chicken with rice and beans. The dough on the doubles was extra tasty.
Amazing food i would definitley come here again and again and again and again Trust me it is so worth it!!!!!
It is so amazing and convenient. I recommend the beef patty, the perfect mix of spice and savor. There is also a drink area and the sorrel is amazing. Please try it
The food here was delicious. Very familial atmosphere with great customer service.
Great food I tried almost everything on the menu
Some great tasty Curry Goat and love the bus up shot roti.

The food was so good, and the amount was definitely worth the price! I got jerk chicken, doubles, and a patty + The lady who served me was sweet enough to let me try a few things I was curious about as well! So with that said I‚Äôll be coming back, it was the perfect meal to end my busy day!
Food was amazing everything was fresh and restaurant clean... I'll definitely be back often

I had the oxtail, it was delicious and very soft!

My husband had the jerk chicken. It was juicy and full of flavor, not too spicy.
Great food, great people, great vibes!
Sooo good great food great music great time with the pals

It is my sole and most heartfelt opinion that this legendary restaurante will change the life and palate of any and all that step thru its doors, with all the Caribbean classics to choose from and the best musical selection dinning there or taking out will be without a doubt one of the best experiences of your existence! I recommend the sorrel juice with a traditional Roti!
great food amazing tunes
Ordered the BBQ fried chicken with rice & peas. Food looks resplendent and was very delicious. The workers are kind. Would come back again!
Doubles had no Flavor very watery
Plenty food...nice caribbean food..
The food is so good I highly recommend!
Classic recipes made well everyday
The place was clean , the workers were welcoming, food was great
The oxtail and rice peas were very delicious but they also have some GREAT doubles here
Place is amazing,love the food and service is great
Amazing service! Amazing food! Leone hooked us up with extra sauce and love. Will be back all the time!

Simply the best.i don‚Äôt need to travel all the way to liberty ave .
They are really authentic delicious and always on point.
Friendly, informal eatery with luscious Guyanese & Caribbean snacks & dishes. A few sit-down tables.
The food was EXCELLENT. Tasty and full of flavor.
Their saltfish fry is so good. incredibly crispy. I would give a 5 but got my order wrong ( ordered curry goat and got curry chicken) it was still really good though! food is 5/5
Definitely enjoyed the food; the menu items were reasonably priced, the atmosphere was welcoming and they had friendly service.
The best roti spot in Brooklyn
I recommend GOAT CURRYü©∑
Enjoyed the food
Food was amazing, great flavor, and they serve a lot of food

Excellent service, delicious food and amazing selection. If you are looking for a new sit down or take-out restaurant Roti on the Run is the place for you. All your favorite Caribbean staples chef-made with authentic flavor.

The best West Indian food I‚Äôve had in a very long time. The food was so fresh, perfect temperature and so delicious. This place definitely have the flavor of the Caribbean ( I never been there) but it surely made me feel like I was. I had the jerk chicken with veggie rice. The sorrel beverage perfect not overly sweet or bitter.
All meat is halal! I give it a 4 out of 5

I came here for lunch and was able to customize my plate. There were soo many options but I settled on the rice and peas , ackee and salt fish and spinach. The service here was excellent. The staff was super friendly and the price was well worth it.

Excellent food, lots of veggie options too! I loved your cooked okra and onions it‚Äôs flavor was light but just enough for a tasty and healthy side! Chief the owner gave me a sample of leftover sauce and veggies from a red snapper dish‚Ä¶

I love the food here and the staff has always been super nice. The only reason I deducted a star for atmosphere is bc it can be a bit warm inside but I'm also not from the Caribbean so I'm used to different weather.
They accept cards but bring cash to leave a tip.
Very tasty food, good portion. Very friendly workers too. Highly recommended.
Always quick, clean, and courteous! The food is delicious and fresh. The servers are patient and kind, thank you to Norissa and Lalisha for always being bright and friendly!
Nah please see this review!! The food was so good I almost shed a tear at the table. The roti is so good, run üèÉüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è it‚Äôs so fresh

Very Respectful Staff ain‚Äôt nothing like some real Caribbean food and your natural fruit juices with variety also if have a sweet tooth they do have pastries I highly recommend. I love the Bake Salt Fish chefs kiss üòò

Customer service is always prompt & pleasant
There is always good options on food choices.
Clean presentation
I love their food ‚ù£Ô∏è

Extremely tasty vegetarian (probably vegan too) options! And how is something this flaky this melt-in-your-mouth moist?! The ladies working here were above and beyond kind and sweet. And can we talk about value?! I think the last time I got this much absolutely delicious food for $8 was ... the 1980s. Seriously. Had a really nice time, eating outside - oh and ZERO plastic was used. Will be back, for sure! (Sorry for the lousy photo - couldn't stop eating!)
I come to this restaurant often and they never disappoint. If you want REAL food that's not an arm and a leg, check them out. Also, the doubles is a 10/10

Roti On The Run is the best halal Caribbean food spot in all 5 boroughs. Came here for the first time a couple days ago and have came every day since. Everything goes crazy. Very humble and kind owner aswell.

I came for the doubles. They were inexpensive and on point. They had the buffet ready & full of hot fresh food. I also called in to make sure they had doubles & I got great service by phone. Roti on the Run is it.
Very delicious I had the curry goat with spinach rice and cabbage flavorful and good portions! Note that In the picture I took a few bites of my food cause it's too good to not immediately chow down
I was greeted and helped with urgency and attentiveness. The food was really fresh and the ladies were so helpful and pleasant.

This spot a true 10.... Came on and off for three years and the food is consistent... Came different times and attention the same ... This is a true Gem to get flavorful Caribbean delights...
Will continue to come ... Their game is on point and price is just right.

Loving the Caribbean flavors and yet the best butter bread from them and it‚Äôs the perfect spot in Brooklyn area to order Caribbean food from.. Not forgetting the hot pepper sauce üå∂ ü•µ ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Ä¶

The food was spectacular it was the first time there for my wife and i, we enjoyed everything that we ordered, BBQ chicken was delicious and juicy, the provision was well garnished and tasted as GÔ£øÔ£ød as it looked and even though i dont eat doubles, my wife could not shut up about it. She kept going on about how well seasoned it was and that she must return. Overall it was a great experience, customer service was great and i also want to give the chef, Maxine a big thumbs up. Your hands are blessed!
I eat here all the time.  I also cater my events with them.  The food is good and the service is great. Highly recommend.

The curry IS NOT IT! Watered down and the portion size was very disrespectful 6 chickpeas and 1 potato plus 3 pieces of chicken is wild. To top it off the Bussup was an overcooked roti skin. First impression was my last suggestion here. I honestly didn't order curry chicken soup

Food was so good. We got the Roti with buss up, some phoularie, and doubles. The Roti was my fav but my girlfriend absolutely loved the phoularie. On top of that, the service was top notch. They made me feel like I was back home in Trinidad. I will definitely add this to my list of places to eat while in NYC.

Bought a few things 10/30/24 the cheese pie had mold. I spoke to the owner and his attitude was worse than the mold on the cheese pie. He also own Bakewell on liberty. You should hear  how he speaks to his workers SAD
Small family owned Caribbean food establishment. Got the Red Snapper with veggies. Clean inside and outside dining area.

I ordered curry shrimp with Dhal puri Roti, and they sent me boneless curry chicken with buss up shots.. when someone orders something through Grubhub, you send them exactly what they want and if you don‚Äôt  have you let the customer know.. you don‚Äôt send the customer what you want.. I was very displeased with the food . And I wont be ordering from their again
Went for the first time today customer service was perfect. she was so sweet. The food was amazing. Will be back very soon. If you want Good Guyanese food!  i promise you this is the place for you.
Amazing food selection and a very kind and welcoming girl who helped me break down the dinner set for a very specific dish I wanted.
